dmca.title: DMCA Notification powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, September 28, 2006 11:58 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: DMCA Notification powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder
Subject: DMCA Notification powersellernyc.com/Sony Camcorder



The Planet: 

Thank you for removing all of Sony Camcorder logos and copyrighted
images from the urls provided, but in order to comply fully all of the
copyrighted images and/or trademarked logos of Sony needs to be removed
from your entire website. This case will remain open until this request
is satisfied in full.  If you should need any further assistance in
reaching compliance please let me know and I will do my best to provide
you with the needed information.  Below you will find more examples of
infringing URL's.

http://powersellernyc.com/product-16970--Sony-DCR-SR100-30-GB-Digital-Ca
mcorder-.html

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14489--Sony-Handycam-DCR-DVD602E-DVD-D
igital-Camcorder-.html

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14480--Sony-DCR-TRV285E-PAL-Digital-8-
Camcorder-.html

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14490--Sony-DCR-DVD703E-DVD-Digital-Ca
mcorder-.html

http://powersellernyc.com/product-14019--Sony-DCR-HC32E-PAL-Camcorder-.h
tml

Thanks in advance for your attention to this matter, 

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail  and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.
